url.description: The URL of the resource for which to fetch oEmbed data.

maxwidth.description: The maximum width of the embed frame in pixels.

maxheight.description: The maximum height of the embed frame in pixels.

discover.description: Whether to perform an oEmbed discovery request for non-whitelisted providers.

key.description: A 12-character Akismet API key. Available at akismet.com/get/

akismet_strictness.description: If true, Akismet will automatically discard the worst spam automatically rather than putting it in the spam folder.

akismet_show_user_comments_approved.description: If true, show the number of approved comments beside each comment author in the comments list page.

interval.description: The time period for which to retrieve stats. Options: 60-days, 6-months, all
The time period for which to retrieve stats. Options: 60-days, 6-months, all

carousel_display_exif.description: Show photo metadata (Exif) in carousel, when available.

jetpack_portfolio.description: Enable or disable Jetpack portfolio post type.

jetpack_portfolio_posts_per_page.description: Number of entries to show at most in Portfolio pages.

jetpack_testimonial.description: Enable or disable Jetpack testimonial post type.

jetpack_testimonial_posts_per_page.description: Number of entries to show at most in Testimonial pages.

tiled_galleries.description: Display all your gallery pictures in a cool mosaic.

gravatar_disable_hovercards.description: View people's profiles when you mouse over their Gravatars

infinite_scroll_google_analytics.description: Use Google Analytics with Infinite Scroll

social_notifications_like.description: Send email notification when someone likes a post

wp_mobile_app_promos.description: Show a promo for the WordPress mobile apps in the footer of the mobile theme.

sharing_services.description: Enabled Services and those hidden behind a button

jetpack-twitter-cards-site-tag.description: The Twitter username of the owner of this site's domain.

custom.description: Custom sharing services added by user.

stb_enabled.description: Show a <em>'follow blog'</em> option in the comment form

stc_enabled.description: Show a <em>'follow comments'</em> option in the comment form

show_headline.description: Highlight related content with a heading

show_thumbnails.description: Show a thumbnail image where available

onpublish.description: Proofread when a post or page is first published.

onupdate.description: Proofread when a post or page is updated.

guess_lang.description: Use automatically detected language to proofread posts and pages

enable_header_ad.description: Display an ad unit at the top of each page.

wordads_display_front_page.description: Display ads on the front page?

admin_bar.description: Put a chart showing 48 hours of views in the admin bar.

roles.description: Select the roles that will be able to view stats reports.

count_roles.description: Count the page views of registered users who are logged in.

hide_smile.description: Hide the stats smiley face image.

end_date.description: Events should start before the specified date

featured.description: Events should be filtered by their featured status

geoloc_lng.description: Requires Events Calendar Pro. Events should be filtered by their venue longitude location, must also provide geoloc_lat

author_name.description: Display name for the object author.

author_user_agent.description: User agent for the object author.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the object.

post.description: The ID of the associated post object.

force.description: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion.

password.description: The password for the parent post of the comment (if the post is password protected).

timezone.description: A city in the same timezone as you.

date_format.description: A date format for all date strings.

time_format.description: A time format for all time strings.

start_of_week.description: A day number of the week that the week should start on.

use_smilies.description: Convert emoticons like :-) and :-P to graphics on display.

default_ping_status.description: Allow link notifications from other blogs (pingbacks and trackbacks) on new articles.

default_comment_status.description: Allow people to post comments on new articles.
